item.title: Salesforce use cases
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Salesforce agentforce platform Salesforce’s Einstein GPT is a key component of their AI-driven capabilities. It serves as a user interface that connects Salesforce’s core offerings (Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Marketing Cloud, etc.
